@mixin mockup($type) { figure { &.mobile, &.tablet-side { max-width: 320px; } @include below-laptop { &.tablet { max-width: 480px; } } @include laptop-and-up { padding: $lem; &.desktop, &.laptop, &.tablet-angle { width: 60%; margin: auto; } &.tablet { max-width: 480px; } } } @if ($type == "desktop right small") { img { max-width: 400px; @include mobile { max-width: 100%; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 750px; } } } @if ($type == "desktop front large") { img { max-width: 600px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } } } @if ($type == "laptop small") { img { max-width: 400px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 750px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile portrait double") { figure { max-width: 400px; @include mobile { max-width: 320px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet portrait overflow") { overflow: hidden; figure { img { border-bottom: 1px solid; } @include mobile { @include figure($overflow: true); img { max-width: 500px; } } } } @if ($type == "tablet angle overflow") { overflow: hidden; @include mobile { figure { @include figure($overflow: true); } } } @if ($type == "tablet side overflow archive") { overflow: hidden; figure { @include figure($overflow: true); max-width: 480px; max-height: 320px; } } }
